p.k: Drama Italy, Switzerland (2016). Hrají: Luigi Diberti, Giovanni Franzoni, Sonia Gessner. Režie: Klaudia Reynicke.
p.d: Cora, a 19-year-old girl, has recently returned to the place where she spent her childhood, Bucco. The arrival of the mysterious Saverio gradually upsets the harmony of the "holy" place, unearthing a crime committed by the villagers 40 years before.
